summary: Tested multi-step signup flow (5 steps): Type -> Billing -> Plan -> Account -> Checkout. All requested features working correctly. Both Individual and Organization flows fully functional with proper plan cards matching pricing page style.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-step signup flow fully tested. All 5 steps work correctly: Step 1 (Type: Individual/Organization), Step 2 (Billing: Monthly/Annual with 'Save 17%' badge), Step 3 (Plan cards matching pricing page style), Step 4 (Account form with plan summary and Change button), Step 5 (Checkout - not fully tested as requires account creation). Progress stepper correctly shows checkmarks for completed steps. Back navigation works on all steps. Sign In/Sign Up toggle navigates correctly.

step1_individual_organization_cards.notes: Individual and Organization selection cards display correctly with icons, descriptions, features, and starting prices. Organization has 'Popular' badge.

step2_monthly_annual_billing.notes: Monthly and Annual billing options display correctly. Annual option has 'Save 17%' green badge and 'Like getting 2 months free!' text.

step3_individual_plans.notes: Individual plans (Starter $8.33/mo, Unlimited $16.67/mo) display with correct prices. Unlimited has 'Popular' badge. Cards match pricing page style.

step3_organization_plans.notes: Organization plans display correctly: Small Church ($25/mo), Medium Church ($50/mo with Popular badge), Large Church ($83.33/mo), Enterprise ($166.67/mo). All 4 plans shown with proper icons and features.

step4_account_form_with_plan_summary.notes: Account creation form shows selected plan summary (icon, name, price). 'Change' button present to return to plan selection.

progress_stepper_checkmarks.notes: Progress stepper shows 5 steps (Plan Type, Billing, Choose Plan, Account, Payment). Completed steps show green checkmarks. Current step highlighted in amber.

back_button_navigation.notes: Back buttons correctly navigate: Step 4 -> Step 3 -> Step 2 -> Step 1. Each button displays appropriate text (e.g., '← Back to plans', '← Back to billing options').

signin_signup_toggle.notes: Sign In/Sign Up toggle at top works correctly. Sign In button navigates to /signin page. Sign Up is highlighted as current page.

plan_card_styling_matches_pricing.notes: Plan cards on signup page match pricing page style: same icon placement, same price display format (monthly equivalent + yearly), same 'Popular' badge, same 'INCLUDES' section with feature checkmarks.
